speech:
Sorry, I didn't understand. You can say 'New Order' .                                                                        
Also, in a new order, please mention only items from our available menu: 
( PRODUCT ID : PRODUCT )
( 402 : Apple Watch Series 1 )          
( 409 : Xbox Wireless Controller )     
( 403 : Apple iPhone 7 )               
( 411 : Samsung Curved Desktop )       
( 410 : Samsung Gear 360 )             
( 408 : DELL LED Desktop )             
( 404 : iPad Air 2 )                   
( 407 : Bose SoundLink Revolve )       
( 405 : Bang & Olufsen BeoPlay Speakers )
( 406 : Beats Solo3 Bluetooth Headset )
( 401 : Samsung Galaxy S9 | S9+ )

Please specify the quantity of each item for the order.
For example: "One ( 411 ) and 2 ( 406 )"
